Qualifiers.Scope: Determination of open and closed segments of a porch

Mandatory: If porch floor is more than 30" above grade, porch sides may need to be 36" high for safety reasons
Optional: Use railings (ballisters) instead of solid half walls to ensure porch sides are considered open
Conditional logic: If porch is 50% open, it does not count toward gross floor area
Dependencies: Porch facade may be considered closed if sides are not open

Alternatives: Use a single safety rail above lower, solid half walls

Logical dependencies: Porch perimeter being 50% open affects its inclusion in gross floor area
